! "<<lingo "Name">>" framework

<<lingo "Description">>

[[Forum thread - Any gamification plugin?|https://talk.tiddlywiki.org/t/any-gamification-plugin/7894/2]]

!! Usage

# Open the layout
#* Use the layout switcher button {{$:/core/ui/Buttons/layout}} on the PageControl to switch the layout
#* Use the shortcut button {{$:/plugins/linonetwo/tw-gamification/tiddlywiki-ui/GoToGameLayoutButton}} on the PageControl to switch to the layout provided by the plugin.
# Fill in the required information, e.g. the default tag for todo tasks (this is only required for the first time)
# Currently it will open a [[default game shipped with the plugin|$:/plugins/linonetwo/scp-foundation-site-director]] (more comes in the future as sub-plugin)
#* Follow the game tutorial and complete the game character creation
#* Follow the in-game tutorial and return to the knowledge base to do things that generate rewards, then return to the game to receive rewards based on the tutorial
#* Use rewards to grow your business in the game and earn more in-game rewards
#* Excess in-game rewards can be redeemed in the store system to reward yourself and motivate you.
#* Keep your promise to yourself, don't cheat and deceive yourself, the only consequence of cheating is that it reduces the effect of the game to motivate you!
# Close the layout and switch back to the default story flow layout
#* Use the layout switcher button {{$:/core/ui/Buttons/layout}} on the PageControl to switch the layout, can use shortcut key `Ctrl+Shift+L` to open it
#* Use the shortcut button {{$:/plugins/linonetwo/tw-gamification/tiddlywiki-ui/GoToGameLayoutButton}} on the PageControl again, click on it again can switch back and forth between the imessage layout and the The default layout.

!! Developing

See [[Official wiki|https://tiddly-gittly.github.io/tw-gamification/]].

<!-- Note that lingo-base should end with a trailing slash character -->
\procedure lingo-base()
$:/language/
\end lingo-base

\procedure lingo(title,override-lingo-base)
<!-- Lingo procedure -->
<!-- Get the parse mode used to invoke this procedure -->
<$parameters $parseMode="parseMode">
	<!-- Compute the lingo-base-->
	<$let active-lingo-base={{{ [<override-lingo-base>!match[]else<lingo-base>] }}}>
		<!-- First try the old school <active-lingo-base><title> format -->
		<$transclude $tiddler={{{ [<active-lingo-base>addsuffix<title>] }}} $mode=<<parseMode>>>
			<!-- If that didn't work, try the new <lingo-base><langcode>/<title> format -->
			<$let language-code={{{  [[$:/language]get[text]get[name]else[en-GB]] }}}>
        <$transclude $tiddler={{{ [<active-lingo-base>addsuffix<language-code>addsuffix[/]addsuffix<title>] }}} $mode=<<parseMode>>/>
			</$let>
		</$transclude>
	</$let>
</$parameters>
\end lingo"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/tw-gamification/readme":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/tw-gamification/readme","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"\define lingo-base() $:/plugins/linonetwo/tw-gamification/language/

/* Game is full-screen, but there is a strange padding below page, cause scrollbar shown. We remove the scrollbar. */
.tc-body {
  overflow-y: hidden;
}

<% endif %>

.tw-gamification-single-text-tag-editor-setting-tags-item input {
  margin-left: 5px;
  padding: 2px;
} 

.tw-gamification-container {
  height: 100vh;
}
.tw-gamification-container > p {
  margin: 0;
}

.tw-gamification-main-area {
  /** minus the tw-gamification-page-control-below-page height */
  height: calc(100vh - 45px);
  /** move input to bottom, and let chat near it */
  justify-content: flex-end;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
}

.tw-gamification-config-before-use {
  padding: 3rem;
  font-size: 1.5rem;
  line-height: 1.7;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
}
.tw-gamification-config-before-use .tc-edit-add-tag {
  margin: 20px 0;
}"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/tw-gamification/tiddlywiki-ui/functions/count-reality-events":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/tw-gamification/tiddlywiki-ui/functions/count-reality-events","tags":"$:/tags/Global","text":"<!-- //TODO: only count by types provided in param -->
